title: FS/FT: Group of 4 Low Grade T212 Obaks  **SOLD**

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Group of 4 Low Grade T212 Obaks  **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T212 Obak cards available for sale. Scans should accurately reflect the condition and prices are listed.  I'd also be interested in trading for other cards I need from the set. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

**LOT IS SOLD.  THANK YOU**
